TextLang.Text: This content can be used by people other than the content owners. However, if all owners are deleted, you will no longer be able to play the content.
To play this content, you must be signed in to PlayStation®Network as the owner.
This content can be played by users other than the content owners. However, the owners' PlayStation®Network password must be saved on the system for other users to use the content.
This content is exclusively for use with the PSP™ system. You must copy the content to a PSP™ system to use it.
(Note that the content can only be played within %1 hours after first playback.)
(Note that the content can only be played within %1 minutes after the first startup.)
Do you want to turn off the system?
Turn Off System Automatically After Background Download
To perform this operation, you must quit [%1]. Do you want to quit the software now?
There is not enough free space on the hard disk. To perform this operation, at least %1 more free space is needed.
This content may already have been copied.
Connect storage media at the save destination.
There is a file with the same name at the save destination.
There is not enough free space on the Memory Stick™. The copy operation may not be completed successfully. Do you want to continue?
There is not enough free space on the SD Memory Card. The copy operation may not be completed successfully. Do you want to continue?
There is not enough free space on the CompactFlash®. The copy operation may not be completed successfully. Do you want to continue?
There is not enough free space on the USB device. The copy operation may not be completed successfully. Do you want to continue?
There is not enough free space on the hard disk. The copy operation may not be completed successfully. Do you want to continue?
There is not enough free space. The copy operation was not completed.
Do you want to cancel the copy operation?
The maximum number of content items that can be saved has been reached. The copy operation was not completed.
Are you sure you want to delete this?
The folder cannot be deleted using this system.
The data type is not supported.
An error occurred during the copy operation.
An error occurred during the delete operation.
No name has been entered. Enter a name of at least 1 character.
There is not enough free space on the Memory Stick™.
The Memory Stick™ cannot be accessed.
The Memory Stick™ cannot be read.
There is no Memory Stick™ inserted.
There is not enough free space on the SD Memory Card.
The SD Memory Card is locked.
The SD Memory Card cannot be accessed.
The SD Memory Card cannot be read.
There is no SD Memory Card inserted.
There is not enough free space on the CompactFlash®.
There is not enough free space on the USB device.
The USB device cannot be accessed.
The USB device cannot be read.
There is no USB device inserted.
There is not enough free space on the hard disk.
The hard disk cannot be accessed.
You must sign in to PlayStation®Network.
You must sign up for PlayStation®Network.
Select an image to use as an icon.
Icons for all tracks in the album will be changed. Do you want to continue?
There are too many media servers. Some media servers will not be displayed.
Access to the media server is not allowed. It is possible that the system name for this PS3™ system, "%1", has not been registered. Check the settings for the media server.
To add content to this playlist, select [Edit] from the options menu.
There are no tracks on the hard disk. The playlist cannot be edited.
There are no images on the hard disk. The playlist cannot be edited.
This name is already in use. Enter another name.
The playlist will be deleted. Are you sure you want to continue?
The content is not available before the start date.
The content has expired and is no longer available.
This content has a time limit. To perform this operation, go to [Settings] > [Date and Time Settings] > [Date and Time], and then select [Set via Internet] to set the time and date.
If you move this content, it will be deleted from this system's hard disk. You will not be able to move the content back to this system. Are you sure you want to continue?
This content can only be played for %1 hours after first playback. Do you want to play it now?
The content will be deleted and cannot be downloaded again. Are you sure you want to continue?

PlayStation®Store recommended content will be downloaded automatically. The PS3™ system will turn on automatically every day to check for recommended content. After the operation has completed, the system will turn off automatically.

To automatically download PlayStation®Store recommended content, you must be set for automatic login under [Users] and must also be set for auto sign-in for PlayStation®Network. For instructions on how to make these settings, refer to the online manual.

The changes you made have disabled the following settings. %1
To enable these settings, you must set a User to log in automatically under [Users]. For information on setting the automatic login option, refer to the online manual.

The changes you made have disabled the following settings. %1
To enable these settings, you must set to sign in automatically to PlayStation®Network. For information on setting the auto sign-in option, refer to the online manual.
ATRAC is not enabled. Go to [Settings] > [System Settings] and enable ATRAC.
The connection to the server timed out.
This operation cannot be used during demonstration mode.
The image will be deleted. Are you sure you want to continue?
The selected images will be deleted. Are you sure you want to continue?
The folder and all images in the folder, including protected images, will be deleted. Are you sure you want to continue?
This image is protected. Are you sure you want to delete the image?
The folder and all images in the folder will be deleted. Are you sure you want to continue?
Delete failed. The folder contains data of types other than image data.
The image will be copied to the hard disk.
All images in the folder will be copied to the hard disk.
There are no images that can be copied.

Create a space to enjoy and enhance your photos. Turn the photos on your PS3™ system into great albums in minutes. You can sort your photos by themes, add music to enhance a slideshow or add custom frames to your photos. The more photos you add, the more fun you can have - the possibilities are endless!
Create a space to enjoy and enhance your photos. Turn the photos on your PS3™ system into great albums in minutes.
Multiple CD information items were found. Select the appropriate CD information item.
Tracks will be copied to the hard disk.
All tracks in the folder will be copied to the hard disk.
All tracks in the folder will be copied to the hard disk. Protected tracks will not be copied.
There is not enough free space on the hard disk. The import operation may not be completed successfully. Do you want to continue?
This track is protected. Are you sure you want to delete the track?
The folder and all tracks in the folder, including protected tracks, will be deleted. Are you sure you want to continue?
Are you sure you want to delete the track?
Are you sure you want to delete the selected tracks?
The folder and all tracks in the folder will be deleted. Are you sure you want to continue?
The folder could not be deleted. The folder contains data of types other than music data.
Tracks will be imported to the hard disk.
Do you want to cancel the import operation?
An error occurred during the import operation.
The maximum number of tracks that can be saved has been reached. The import operation stopped.
There are no tracks that can be copied.
The copyright protection information is invalid.
Do you want to save the revised information? Revised contents will be applied to all tracks in the folder.
Copyright-protected tracks will not be copied.
Copy completed. Copyright-protected tracks were not copied.
PlayStation®Store is the only place to rent or own the latest movies for your PS3™ and PSP™ systems. Visit PlayStation®Store today.

PlayStation®Store is the only place to rent or own the latest movies for your PS3™ and PSP™ systems.
Visit PlayStation®Store today.
All titles in the folder will be copied to the hard disk. Copyright-protected titles will not be copied.
The maximum number of titles that can be saved has been reached.
The titles will be copied to the hard disk.
Copyright-protected titles will not be copied.
There are no titles that can be copied.
A USB device that is compatible with copyright-protection features is required to perform this operation.
Copy completed. Copyright-protected titles were not copied.
The title will be moved to the hard disk.
Do you want to cancel the move operation?
An error occurred during the move operation.
The move operation cannot be completed. To move this title you must use a Memory Stick PRO™.
Select the title to be deleted.
The title will be deleted. Are you sure you want to continue?
The selected titles will be deleted. Are you sure you want to continue?
The folder and all titles in the folder will be deleted. Are you sure you want to continue?
The folder and all titles in the folder, including protected titles, will be deleted. Are you sure you want to continue?
This title is protected. Are you sure you want to delete the title?
The folder could not be deleted. The folder contains data of types other than video data.
Copyright protection information is corrupted, and will be restored.
An error occurred during restoration of the copyright protection information.
This operation is not available here.
You can edit a video that you like, upload it to a video sharing website, and then invite your friends to view the video.
The content will be deleted. Are you sure you want to continue?
The maximum number of content items that can be created has been reached.
The BD data will be deleted. Are you sure you want to continue?
This game cannot be started unless it is installed on the hard disk. Do you want to start installing?

PlayStation®Store is packed with exclusive downloadable games, FREE PS3™ demos, add-on packs and videos.
Visit the store today!

FREE* to access, PlayStation®Store is the only place to download new and exclusive PS3™ games, FREE playable demos, add-on packs, and high-definition videos.
Get more for your PS3™ and visit PlayStation®Store today.
* Broadband Internet connection required.
This model of the PS3™ system is not compatible with PlayStation®2 format software.
This content is exclusively for use with the PSP™ system. You must copy it to a PSP™ system. Do you want to copy now?
This software cannot be started due to region restrictions.
An error occurred during the start operation.
The system software of your PS3™ system is version %1. To start, you must update to version %2 or later. Do you want to update now?
You will need to update the system software before your next use.

Library programs ©Sony Computer Entertainment Inc. Licensed for play on the PlayStation®3 Computer Entertainment System or authorized PlayStation®3 format systems. For full terms and conditions see the user's manual. This product is authorized and produced under license from Sony Computer Entertainment Inc. Use is subject to the copyright laws and the terms and conditions of the user's license.
The installed game will be deleted. Are you sure you want to continue?
The characters "*/:<>?| cannot be used in names.
There are no internal memory cards.
The memory card cannot be accessed.
Copying of this saved data is not allowed.
There are no trophies. If you play a game that supports the trophy feature and collect trophies, they will be displayed here.
The latest update data has been found. The system will quit this software and start installing.

Use a device that supports remote play (such as a PSP™ system) to operate this system over a network. Go to [Settings] > [Remote Play Settings] > [Register Device] and register the remote play device.
Do you want to cancel the download operation?
An error occurred during communication with the server.
This content cannot be used during remote play.
You must perform a PSP™ system software update. For information on update methods, refer to the instructions for the PSP™ system.
You must sign up for PlayStation®Network. Do you want to sign up now?
The content was deleted from the server.
To use this feature, you must first download software. Do you want to download now?

PlayStation®Store is packed with exclusive downloadable games, FREE PS3™ demos, add-on packs and videos.
Visit the store today!

FREE* to access, PlayStation®Store is the only place to download new and exclusive PS3™ games, FREE playable demos, add-on packs, and high-definition videos.
Get more for your PS3™ and visit PlayStation®Store today.
* Broadband Internet connection required.
Enjoy FREE* online gaming, download games, expansion packs and exclusive content, chat with friends, and compare Trophies. Sign up now and let the fun begin! * Broadband Internet connection required.

PlayStation®Network is all about entertainment and interaction. Enjoy FREE* online gaming, download amazing new games, game expansion packs for a host of top titles, watch trailers and get your hands on exclusive content, chat with friends, and compare Trophies.
Sign up today – it's easy and it's FREE!
* Broadband Internet connection required.
Adjust settings for your PlayStation®Network account or for purchases made at PlayStation®Store.

Welcome to PlayStation®3. The "What's New" screen is where to find all the latest PlayStation® news, updates, plus easy access to the games you've most recently played. To access the "What's New" screen, connect to PlayStation®Network* – it's free to join and it's your gateway to a world of entertainment, so sign up today!
* Broadband Internet connection required.

The "What's New" screen is where to find the latest PlayStation® news, plus access to the games you've most recently played; just connect to PlayStation®Network* – it's free to join and it's your gateway to a world of fun! * Broadband Internet connection needed.
You are launching an Internet website.
This content is exclusively for use with the PSP™ system. Do you want to install it on the PSP™ system now?

This content can be used after signing in to PlayStation®Network and copying the content to the hard disk of this system. You can also play the content on a PSP™ system if you copy it to the PSP™ system.
This service is not available in your country/region.
You will be required to enter a password when signing in to PlayStation®Network. Do you want to continue?
The operation cannot be performed. Some PlayStation®Network features are currently undergoing maintenance.
Last Sign-In: 2 or More Years Ago
The maximum number of people who can be added has been reached.
Pending response to add as a Friend.
You have received a request to add a Friend.
Do you want to add as a Friend?
Reply to Request to Add a Friend
Signs in to PlayStation®Network automatically at PS3™ system login.
This Friend will be deleted. If you delete, you will be deleted from the other person's Friends. Are you sure you want to continue?
A Friend that is pending addition will be deleted. If you delete, you will be deleted from the other person's Friends. Are you sure you want to continue?
If you add to the block list, you will no longer receive messages from this person. Do you want to continue?
Are you sure you want to delete from the block list?
An error has occurred. Try again later.
Do you want to cancel the attach operation?
Do you want to delete all messages? Protected messages will not be deleted.
Are you sure you want to delete the message?
Do you want to delete all messages?
An error occurred during the add operation.
The maximum size for files that can be attached has been reached.
The attached file has been deleted.
This player has already been added.
The maximum number of messages that can be protected has been reached. You can protect up to 50 messages.
The operation cannot be performed. You are not signed in.
This operation cannot be performed during remote play.
You cannot create a message now.
You cannot add a Friend to your block list. You must delete the person from your Friends list before adding them to your block list.
Do you want to log out?
Do you want to log in as the selected user? The currently logged in user will be logged out.
No additional users can be created. The maximum number of users that can be created is 16.
The name you entered has already been used. Enter a different user name.
An error occurred during user creation.
Are you sure you want to delete the user?
From now on, "%1" will be logged in automatically when the PS3™ system is started.
If you delete the User, saved data for PlayStation®3 format software, messages, trophies and other information will also be deleted. Are you sure you want to continue?
The following characters cannot be entered: %1

INSTALL package files from Storage Devices and your PS3™.
DELETE package files from Storage Devices and your PS3™.
INSTALL from [dev_hdd0/packages] folder on your PS3™.
DELETE from [dev_hdd0/packages] folder on your PS3™.
INSTALL from [packages] folder on your Storage Device.
DELETE from [packages] folder on your Storage Device.
INSTALL from the standard [★ Install Package Files] locations.
DELETE from the standard [★ Install Package Files] locations.
If using the content on a PS Vita system, connect the PS Vita system using a USB cable, and then start [Content Manager] on the PS Vita system.

Use a device that supports remote play (such as a PS Vita or a PSP™ system) to operate this system over a network. Go to [Settings] > [Remote Play Settings] > [Register Device] and register the remote play device.
